text: Malcolm Tierney (25 February 1938 - 18 February 2014) was an English actor. He began his career in 1964. He had many different roles in movies, television shows, and theatre. He was born in Manchester, which was then part of Lancashire. Tierney died on 18 February 2014, at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Manchester Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors
title: Malcolm Tierney
